text: Guess who's back? Back again... That's why they call him Slim Shady after all. Eminem has now revealed that his new album is called Revival, and has also announced that it'll hit shelves on December 15. Including his previously released track'Walk on Water'featuring Beyonc√©, the record has 19 new tracks in all.
